title: Time constant of LR circuit with 2 resistors

content.question: An inductor and two resistors are connected to an ideal battery, as shown in the figure above. What is the time constant for the circuit?

topic.text: 13.5: Circuits with Resistors and Inductors (LR Circuits)

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
